nodes.documentation:
@notice Change the number of elements you can loop through in this contract
@param _loopLimit The new loop limit
nodes.name: changeLoopLimit
mintBond

nodes.documentation:
@notice Redeem coupons on your bonds
@param _bonds An array of bond ids corresponding to the bonds you want to redeem apon
nodes.name: redeemCoupons
transfer

nodes.documentation: @notice Donate money to this contract
nodes.name: donate
getMoney

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get the last time coupons for a particular bond were redeemed
@param bond The bond id to analyze
nodes.name: getLastTimeRedeemed

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get the owner of a specific bond
@param bond The bond id to analyze
nodes.name: getBondOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get how many coupons remain to be redeemed for a specific bond
@param bond The bond id to analyze
nodes.name: getRemainingCoupons

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get how many coupons were redeemed for a specific bond
@param bond The bond id to analyze
nodes.name: getCouponsRedeemed

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the address of the token that is redeemed for coupons
nodes.name: getTokenAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Get how many times coupons can be redeemed for bonds
nodes.name: getTimesToRedeem

nodes.documentation: @dev Get how much time it takes for a bond to mature
nodes.name: getTerm

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get the maturity date for a specific bond
@param bond The bond id to analyze
nodes.name: getMaturity

nodes.documentation: @dev Get how much money is redeemed on a coupon
nodes.name: getSimpleInterest

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the yield of a bond
nodes.name: getCouponRate

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the par value for these bonds
nodes.name: getParValue

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the cap amount for these bonds
nodes.name: getCap

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get amount of bonds that an address has
@param who The address to analyze
nodes.name: getBalance

nodes.documentation: @dev If the par value is a real number, it might have decimals. Get the amount of decimals the par value has
nodes.name: getParDecimals

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the address of the token redeemed for coupons
nodes.name: getTokenToRedeem

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the name of this smart bond contract
nodes.name: getName

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the current unpaid debt
nodes.name: getTotalDebt

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the total amount of bonds issued
nodes.name: getTotalBonds

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the latest nonce
nodes.name: getNonce

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the amount of time that needs to pass between the dates when you can redeem coupons
nodes.name: getCouponThreshold
